title: Wont let me create rune pages
body: I just hit level 15, and already had 1 rune page created. I edited that one and went to create a new rune page, which would have been my 2nd custome rune page. It starts to create a rune page, but when I select the primary path it just takes me back to all of the rune pages. It wont allow me to create my 2nd free rune page. Any suggestions?

replies.body: Let me know if you're still having this problem, it looks like you currently have 2 rune pages created as of writing this. If it's still not working, I can manually delete those pages so you can try with fresh empty rune pages. There's also a small chance this is some kind of connection related issue too, so we may need to adjust a couple settings.
Its showing only 1 in my game...I did a game repair and closed and reopened my client several times and still only 1 rune page
Oh, and Im not sure why you see 2 rune pages....when Im in champ select I only have 1 rune page to pick from, not 2
Now I have 2 runes pages...thanks if you did anmything to help me
Must have been something connection related, since I actually just now got back to work and saw these updates. Didn't ever touch anything on my end xD!
I am having the same issue.

Up. I have that same issue.

1 page, x in top corner, won't allow me to create.

Any solutions ?

I have the same problem on euw at the moment after hitting level 11. Theres an (X) at top right when trying to make a second runepage. Its like the runepage UI is hidden behind the "collection>Runes" UI.
